Instruction: In a large bowl, mash the cooked potatoes and mix in the flour, salt, and pepper until combined.

Heat vegetable oil over medium heat; sautï¿½ onion, stirring often, until fragrant, about 2 to 3 minutes. Add tomato and cook until the onion is tender and the tomato is soft, roughly 5 to 10 minutes. Incorporate potatoes, garam masala, cayenne pepper, salt, and sugar into the onion-tomato mixture; simmer, stirring frequently, until the flavors meld, approximately 5 minutes. Fold in cilantro and cook for an additional minute.
